sense.def:
The reason for something
so dejanske okoliščine, s katerimi lahko pojasnimo, zakaj se je nekaj zgodilo ali zakaj obstaja.

seg.quote: I asked the reason for the decision.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
reason
pokažemo, da nekaj mislimo ali občutimo in da so jasni razlogi za to, da tako mislimo ali občutimo.

seg.quote: I have reason to believe that you are concealing something.
I'm getting annoyed, and with reason.

sense.def:
Reason
je tudi zmožnost ljudi, da razmišljajo in presojajo.

seg.quote: He had to rely less on reason than on the rousing of emotion.

sense.def:
To get someone to listen to reason
pomeni, da človeka prepričamo, da posluša pametne utemeljitve in se ravna po njih.

seg.quote: The man refused to listen to reason.

sense.def:
To reason that something is the case
pomeni, da šele po skrbnem razmisleku sklenemo, da je nekaj res tako, kot trdimo.

seg.quote: Copernicus reasoned that the earth revolved around the sun.

sense.def:
To reason with someone
pomeni poskušati nekoga z logičnim utemeljevanjem prepričati o nečem.
